item.title: More than Spuds and Guinness: Food from Dubliner Memory
This transatlantic trade deal is a full-frontal assault on democracy | George Monbiot
item.description:
This transatlantic trade deal is a full-frontal assault on democracy | George Monbiot

Remember that referendum about whether we should create a single market with the United States? You know, the one that asked whether corporations should have the power to strike down our laws? No, I don't either. Mind you, I spent 10 minutes looking for my watch the other day before I realised I was wearing it.

item.title: The EPA Says Just 3 Pesticides Could Harm Nearly All Endangered Species
item.description:
The EPA Says Just 3 Pesticides Could Harm Nearly All Endangered Species

What do grizzly bears, gray wolves, California condors, and coho salmon have in common? All are protected by the Endangered Species Act (ESA) and all are likely to be harmed by three commonly used pesticides, according to a new report from the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA).

item.title: Dillard University Visits Slow Food Ghana - Slow Food Foundation
item.description:
Dillard University Visits Slow Food Ghana - Slow Food Foundation

Dillard University is a private, historically black liberal arts college in New Orleans founded in 1869. The University offers both Bachelor of Arts and Bachelor of Science degrees, and has a College of Business and a College of Arts and Sciences. The Dillard team was led by Re'Shawn N.

item.title: Make your own vegetable garden!
item.description:
Make your own vegetable garden!

Tending your own vegetable garden is surely one of the most relaxing and satisfying pastimes , taking care of it day by day and following it through the cycle of the seasons. With a little effort, anyone can do it.
